entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
